tool_description: A collections of all latest transfer headlines across the globe.
title: Sport Transfer News

api_list.name: Get Individual Transfer News
api_list.description: This will return all transfer update from single source.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sport-transfer-news.p.rapidapi.com/sports/{transferupdateid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sport-transfer-news.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all sport transfer new
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all latest transfer headlines in sport
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sport-transfer-news.p.rapidapi.com/sports"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
